column3: The  instant application is  not  an  application for  bail, but a  revision  application to  get the
order of the  learned  High Court Judge  dated  25 .07.2019 revised. The  learned  High  Court
Judge  has  to  decide  upon  the  matter according to  the  facts  that  prevailed  at  the  time  the
order was  made.  By  the  time  the  impugned  order  was  made  by  the  learned  High  Court

column2: Judge,  the  Petitioner  had  not  been

column3: months.  The Petitioner was  initially remanded for  this case on 28. 10.2018.  Therefore, the
learned  High  Court  Judge  has  not  acted  in  contravention  of section  16  of the  Bail  Act
when he made the impugned order on 25 .07.2019.
